metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27795 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
A segmentation fault was discovered in radare2 with adf command. Inlibr/core/cmd_anal.c, when command "adf" has no or wrong argument,anal_fcn_data (core, input + 1) --> RAnalFunction *fcn = r_anal_get_fcn_in(core->anal, core->offset, -1); returns null pointer for fcn causingsegmentation fault later in ensure_fcn_range (fcn).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-27795` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libradare2-5.0.0 - 5.5.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1
libradare2-common - 5.5.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1
radare2 - 5.5.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: radare2 package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.5.0+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
